4539.真・オノむそうの極意: Secret of Axes of True Evil

increases!

weight of

21475.敵１体の守備力を\n少し下げる:
Lowers defense of
one enemy
slightly.

21496.エリアに入ると\n動作不能になる\n魔法陣を描く:
A circle trap
that will
disable enemies.

21604.仲間ひとりの\n攻撃力を\nかなり上げる:
Significantly
raise attack
of an ally.

21630.周囲の仲間の\n守備力を\n少し上げる:
Slightly raises
defense of
all allies.

21654.周囲の仲間の\n行動間隔を\n少し短くする:
Shortens action
wait of
nearby allies.

21681.周囲の仲間の\nブレスダメージを\n少し軽減する:
Raises all allies
breath resistance
slightly.

21713.一定時間\n呪文をはねかえす\n魔法のバリア:
A barrier that
continually
reflects spells.

21742.周囲の仲間の\n攻撃呪文耐性を\n少しあげる:
Slightly raises
spell resistance
of all allies.

21771.範囲内にいる\n敵の守備力を\n少し下げる:
Lowers defense of
a nearby enemy
slightly.

21798.範囲内にいる\n敵の行動間隔を\n長くする:
Lengthens action
wait of nearby
enemies.

21825.範囲内の敵が\n攻撃呪文に\n弱くなる:
Lowers spell
resistance of
nearby enemies.

21849.範囲内の敵を\n深い眠りにさそう:
Attempts to put
nearby enemies
to sleep.

21889.行動せずに仲間の\nダメージを受ける:
Stand still and
take an ally's
damage.

21914.敵１体に\nダメージを与え\nテンションダウン:
Damage an enemy
and lower
their tension.

21966.敵を攻撃しつつ\n攻撃力も下げる:
Attack an enemy
and lower
their attack.

21988.大ダメージを与え\n敵をふっとばす:
Deals great
damage and knocks
back enemies.

22012.攻撃力を２段階と\nダメージを下げる:
Reduce damage
and attack by
2 stages.

22037.敵１体の激怒を\n解除する:
Disables the
rage of one
enemy.

22055.雑念をはらい\nブレスダメージに\n強くなる:
Become more
resistant to
breath damage.

22106.周囲の敵を\n大声でおどかし\n動けなくする:
Yell and attempt
to frighten
nearby enemies.

22217.テンションを\n一定時間維持する:
Maintain your
tension for a
duration.

22285.自分もキズつくが\nダメージもアップ:
Deals a strong
attack that also
damages you.

22344.なぐられると\nテンションアップ:
Gain tension
when you
are hit.

22366.攻撃時ＨＰ回復の\n効果をえる:
Restores HP based
on damage
dealt.

22387.チカラを一気に\n２回ためる攻撃:
An attack that
raises tension
by 2 levels.

22409.やいばに\n全身を包んで\n自分の身を守る:
Wrap yourself in
spikes to damage
attackers.

22436.ＨＰの３０％を\n仲間ひとりに\n分け与える:
Transfer 30% of
your HP to a
single ally.

22465.周りの仲間を\n身体をはって守る:
Take damage
in place of
nearby allies.

22523.光で周囲を滅する\n星雲のかがやき:
Destroys nearby
enemies with a
light nebula.

22547.１度だけダメージ\n無効にする:
Nullify one
source of damage
one time.

22568.自分を強化して\nふっとびに耐える:
Endure yourself
to any knockback
effects.

22592.優しい心で\n弱い敵を\n逃がしてあげる:
Let weak enemies
escape from
battle.

22634.逃げそうな敵を\nすかさず足止め:
Prevent enemies
from escaping
the battle.

22656.不思議なきりで\nブレスを1回回避:
A fog that can
nullify a breath
attack once.

22697.暗黒のきりで\n相手を弱らせる:
Dark fog that
weaken and
blinds enemies.

22718.白いオオカミが\n４回攻撃する:
A white wolf
attacks the enemy
4 times.

22739.黒い魔獣が攻撃し\nダメージも増加:
A black monster
attacks and
damage increases.

22763.魔法の結界で\n攻撃呪文から\n自分の身を守る:
Raise your spell
resistance with
a magic ward.

22814.動きを止めて\nＭＰを徐々に回復:
Focus yourself
and recover your
MP.

22858.攻撃呪文耐性を\n下げる３回攻撃:
Three attacks
that reduce
spell resistance.

22917.ＨＰが半分以上時\n即死をまぬがれる:
Avoid fatal
damage if HP is
more than half.

22988.聖なる光で\nダメージを与える:
Damages an enemy
with holy light.

23009.ＨＰが２以上で\n即死をまぬがれる:
Avoid fatal
damage if HP is
2 or more.

23033.仲間をいやす\nめぐみの雨が降る:
Allies will
restore HP when
taking damage.

23150.仲間のダメージを\n大きくいやす雨:
Rain that greatly
heals damage
allies take.

23174.周囲の仲間に\n炎のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
fire.

23196.周囲の仲間に\n氷のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
ice.

23218.周囲の仲間に風と\n雷のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
wind and thunder.

23243.周囲の仲間に土と\n闇のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
dark and earth.

23268.周囲の仲間に\n光のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
light.

23311.ＭＰをすべて使い\n敵を打ち滅ぼす\n最強の光の呪文:
Uses all MP in a
giant blast of
light.

23346.周囲にピオラと\nチャージ１０秒短:
Reduces party's
action wait and
CT skills 10s.

23370.仲間モンスターを\n一時的に強化する:
Temporarily power
up your fellow
monster.

23395.敵の魔法陣や\n爆弾を横取りする:
Steal enemy
magic circles
and bombs.

23417.消費アイテムの\n効果を２倍にする:
Doubles the
effect of
consumable items.

23441.ダメージ軽減する\n魔法陣を作る:
A magic circle
that reduces
damage taken.

23463.消費アイテムの\n効果範囲を広げる:
Expand the effect
range of
consumable items.

23487.ＨＰ回復する\n魔法陣を作る:
Magic circle
that slowly
restores HP.

23525.どうぐの効果が\n倍化と範囲化する:
Item effects and
their range are
doubled.

23549.きようさ次第で\nアイテムをぬすむ:
Steal an item
based on your
Deftness.

23573.敵１体の正体を\n討伐モンスター\nリストに書き込む:
Write an enemy's
secret details to
the Bestiary.

23608.近くの宝の場所を\n地図上でしらせる:
Reveal nearby
treasures on
your map.

23633.バナナをしかけて\n転ばせられるぞ:
Place a banana
that can be
tripped on.

23657.巨大なバクダンで\n敵をふっとばす:
Blow away foes
with a huge
bomb.

23681.死んだふりで\n敵をあざむき\nしっかりＨＰ回復:
Pretend to be
dead and recover
HP.

23713.威力がアップした\nバクダンをおく:
Place bombs that
are more
powerful.

23756.テンションを\n敵１体から奪う:
Attacks and
steals tension
from 1 enemy.

23777.周囲の味方に\n攻撃時猛毒の効果:
Grants allies an
envenom effect
on attacks.

23799.周囲の味方の会心\n暴走率アップ:
Boosts critical
and haywire rate
of allies.

23821.周囲の味方の呪文\n回復量をアップ:
Boosts spell
recovery of
nearby allies.

23845.周囲の味方の呪文\nダメージをアップ:
Boosts spell
damage of
nearby allies.

23870.周囲の味方を\n回復し生き返す:
Restore and
revive all
nearby allies.

23891.周囲の味方に\n攻撃時ＭＰ回復:
Grant allies MP
recovery on
attacks.

23912.周囲の味方に\n攻撃時ＨＰ回復:
Grant allies HP
recovery on
attacks.

23933.呪文特技の発動と\n行動間隔を短縮:
Quicken action
execution and
action wait time.

23957.周囲の敵の特技と\n呪文とブレス封印:
Seal nearby enemy
skills, spells,
breath attacks.

24013.周囲の敵の炎と\n光耐性ダウン:
Lowers fire and
light res. of
nearby enemies.

24034.周囲の敵の雷と\n風耐性ダウン:
Lowers thunder
and wind res. of
nearby enemies.

24055.周囲の敵の氷と\n闇と土耐性ダウン:
Lowers ice, dark,
and earth res. of
nearby enemies.

24092.周囲の味方の\n攻撃力を増加する:
Increase attack
power of
nearby allies.

24114.色紙代をはらって\n敵１体サイン攻撃:
Attack one enemy
with your
autograph!

24179.ボディーガードを\nゴールドでやとう:
Pay Gold to hire
a Bodyguard to
protect you.

24204.最高のほほえみで\n経験値とＧアップ:
Increases EXP and
Gold earned
after battle.

24229.ゴールドを使って\nセレブなダメージ:
Deals damage to
nearby enemies
using Gold.

24254.経験値とゴールド\n特訓スタンプ増加:
Earned EXP,
Gold, and stamps
increase.

24279.敵周囲を攻撃し\n消費Ｇを０にする:
Attacks nearby
enemies. G costs
are now 0.

24303.ボケたおして\n周囲の敵を\nわらわせる:
If nearby enemies
laugh, raises
tension 1 level.

24329.ツッコんで\n仲間ひとりを\nわれに返す:
Cures paralysis,
charmed, sleep,
confused status.

24355.敵の攻撃を\nタップで身かわす:
Dance that
makes dodging
attacks easier.

24376.嵐のごとく\n玉をなげつける:
Hit an enemy
with a barrage
of balls.

24395.周囲の仲間の\nＨＰを７０～回復:
Restores at least
70 HP to all
nearby allies.

24417.周囲の仲間を\nわれに返す:
Return all
allies to
their senses.

24435.鬼神のごとく\n鉄球をなげつける:
Drop demonic iron
balls on an
enemy.

24478.周囲のＨＰを\n２００～回復する:
Restores at least
200 HP
around you.

24500.敵１体を攻撃し\nブレスを封じる:
Hit an enemy
and seal their
breath attacks.

24522.仲間ひとりと\nＨＰを分かち合う:
Share your HP
with one of your
companions.

24544.仲間ひとりと\nＭＰを分かち合う:
Share your MP
with one of your
companions.

24566.敵モンスターを\n１体呼び寄せる:
Calls another
enemy to join
the battle.

24588.敵１体を攻撃し\n特技を封じる:
Attacks 1 enemy
and seals their
skills.

24630.敵モンスターを\n２体呼び寄せる:
Calls 2 of the
targeted enemy
into battle.

25667.敵の攻撃を\nかわしやすくなる:
Increases the
chance to
dodge attacks.
